body:
Features and Enhancements

NBO (fka Network Modeling)
  • Provider Search Results
    • Added 'In Model' filter to search page.
    • Changed History tab to location based instead of provider.
    • Added a way to view delta total for all locations selected.
    • Made summary count boxes on Network Model Summary tab links to results page.
    • Now displaying comments on History tab.
    • Added 'Locations' summary count box on left, representing all provider locations in model.
Competitive Dashboard
  • PDF Export
    • Added Competitive Dashboard Results overview page to PDF Export.
Data
  • Group/Tax Id Number Data
    • Data now includes Tax Id Number (TIN), initially for use in NBO.
